none: The Bill of sale was recorded in Buncombe County NC. County, North Carolina on March 10, 1826. Elizabeth Murray sold the enslaved person(s) Saly - Black ("negro"),Mary - Black ("negro") - 7-8,Dock - Black ("negro") - 13 to William Murray.
